name: Shiro
intro: A platform for decentralized apps to store files of any kind
introduce: Shiro is a platform for decentralized applications to store files of any kind. Built by developers Aayush Naik and Samyak Sarnayak, Shiro Storage’s cutting-edge decentralized storage solution handles the heavy lifting for developers by providing a simple interface that enables them to store files with only a Solidity contract and a client that calls it.
